SmartFieldSpec.Name: Statements - Average Months Delinquent Child Sponsorships By Past Due Amount Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Average months delinquent as of the 2nd of the month for all child sponsorships for a sponsor - using Past Due Amount instead of NTD.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.DisplayName: Statements Average months delinquent by Past Due Amount
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_STATEMENTS_AVERAGEMONTHSDELINQUENT_AMTPASTDUE ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date ; with DelinquencyWithNegatives as (select ft.CONSTITUENTID, floor (AVG( case when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE in (0,1,2) then -- Annually, Semi-annually, Quarterly case when day (rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE) < day (getdate()) then DATEDIFF(m, rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, getdate())+ 1 else DATEDIFF(m, rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, getdate()) end -- This get's the past due amount as of the 2nd of the current month when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 3 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT -- Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 6 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 6)/12) -- Bimonthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 7 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 24)/12) -- Semi-Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 8 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 26)/12) -- Biweekly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 9 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 52)/12) -- Weekly end )) as AVGMONTHSDELINQUENT from dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rsch join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.id = rsch.id join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on ft.ID = rsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.REVENUESPLITID = rsplit.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD on SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID
where ft.TYPECODE = 2 --recurring gift and rsch.STATUSCODE = 0 --active and s.STATUSCODE = 1 and ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT > 0 -- exclude $0 RGs group by ft.CONSTITUENTID ) select CONSTITUENTID, case when AVGMONTHSDELINQUENT < 0 then 0 else AVGMONTHSDELINQUENT end as AVGMONTHSDELINQUENT from DelinquencyWithNegatives where AVGMONTHSDELINQUENT is not null
